summary: All in one player home located in Markarth, fit for large companion army. No Load Door inside.
descriptionHtml:
[size=80][color=red][b][center]The Red Castle[/center][/b][/color][/size]
[center][img=800x452]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-2-1375709925.jpg[/img][/center]

A nice castle player house in Markarth, you and your companions can live a secure live there!

It follows my own rules for a good house: NO LOADING DOORS inside, good for companions collecting role play style, and with more than enough weapon displaying equipment, storage, bookshelves, and rich merchants inside.


[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-5-1375709909.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=50][color=yellow][b][center]Main features:[/size][/color][/b][/center]
1, A master bedroom with [color=yellow]secret treasury and secret exit[/color] to wilderness that only dragonborn can pass through.
2, [color=yellow]Armory That can display hamlet, boots and gloves[/color].
3, Three big enough living room and MANY extra beds for 20+ companions live on.
4, Three rich merchants.

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-3-1375709909.jpg[/img][/center]

In account, that house was equipped with:
Load door *0 inside house
Armory
Secret treasury
Secret Exit to Markarth exterior
Mannequins *5
Shield and weapon plaque *3 sets
Single weapon plaque *2
Plaque for 4 daggers *2
Special staff display *3 sets
Shield plaque *8
Weapon rack * 35
Large display case *1
10 Dragon Mask display space *1
Bookshelf book space *176
Safe, Strongbox and Chests *13
Alchemy table *1
Enchanting table *2
Full crafting set *2
Merchant *3
Fast Travel from the house is Allowed.

[color=yellow][b]Key to the house can be found on a body at Salvius farm.
If you can not found the body, install the update file, a new barrel with key was prepared next to the castle door. See picture below.[/color][/b] 


[center][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/39600-1-1375965048.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/39600-1-1376064667.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=50][color=yellow][b][center]*Game Bugs*
[/size][/color][/b][/center]
Below are some tricks about the game, not my mod\'s incompetence.

1, Please allow [color=yellow]about 40 second[/color] for the house to load up, when your first time entry. 
As the castle have no load door while considerably big in size, it dose require some time for it to loading up, like putting those sword and shield in right place on plaque, and placing some apples on the shelf.

2, Gold in merchant\'s hand [color=yellow]SHALL NOT reach some 35,000[/color]. Once merchant\'s money get over 35,000(or some much near that) they begins not giving out money, that means you sell your things with no money increase.
I made the 3 merchants some more richer than others in game, so you better sell before you buy as it make merchants money keep low.

3, If mannequins floating on air, or not in right place, just put some armor on it and it will go back to correct place. [color=yellow]Or you may just go with the no mannequin and secret exit version[/color].


[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-2-1375709908.jpg[/img][/center]



[size=50][color=yellow][b][center]*INSTALL*
[/size][/color][/b][/center]
Just use the NMM.
This mod contains MANY meshes and texture which lead to a [color=yellow]45MB size[/color]. So may be you will have to wait some time for download complete.
Information for advanced user: this mod contains 1 .esp and 1 .esm file, they are [TheRed.esp] and [_tck_FlexContainers.esm]. BOTH OF THEM SHOULD BE LOADED.

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-4-1375709909.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=50][color=yellow][b][center]*Improvement*
[/size][/color][/b][/center]
I worked WEEKS to make it work like this, but if any mistake found, please let me know and I will then correct it.
And if you like the house, please endorse this mod, it keeps me make more even better mods!


[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25504-1-1375709924.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=50][color=yellow][b][center]*Credits*
[/size][/color][/b][/center]
With great thanks and respect, below are those great mod and resources I used.
